name: Notebook
description: Developed a Notebook app using the MERN Stack with secure User Authentication, JWT-based access and refresh tokens.
Employed Redux Toolkit for efficient and smooth state management on the frontend.
Users can create, search, and organize multiple notebooks with custom sections and pages. Includes a search bar for quickly finding desired notebooks.
Integrated TinyMCE editor for a comprehensive note-taking experience. Supports text formatting (bold, italics, colors), image uploads, tables, and more.
Developed multiple controllers and routes for notebooks, sections, and pages. Includes create, retrieve, update, and delete operations for efficient data handling.
Designed to enhance productivity and organized note management, delivering both functionality and a seamless user experience.

name: Portfolio Website
description: Developed a personal portfolio website using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to showcase my skills and projects in a professional layout.
Implemented sections such as Hero, About, Skills, Projects, and Services, creating a well-structured user journey.
Enhanced user experience with animations using the AOS (Animate on Scroll) library for smooth, engaging scroll effects.
Designed a clean and responsive interface, ensuring compatibility and optimal performance across different devices.

name: on.time
description: Developed a responsive ToDo app named on.time using Angular 14, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS, designed to streamline task management for users.
Implemented an intuitive task input feature with an input field and save button, allowing users to quickly add tasks to their list with ease.
Enabled task deletion functionality so users can mark tasks as complete and remove them with a single click, enhancing the app's usability and organization.
Integrated local storage to save tasks persistently, allowing users to retrieve their task list even after refreshing or closing the app, ensuring data reliability.
Utilized Angularâ€™s powerful features such as two-way data binding for real-time updates and component-based architecture to keep the code modular and maintainable.
Designed a fully responsive layout, ensuring a consistent and user-friendly experience across all devices, from desktops to mobile screens.

name: Noise Clone
description: Developed a Noise Clone e-commerce website with essential shopping features, including product categories, product detail pages, search filters, and a shopping cart.
Utilized Angular's data binding, directives (`ngFor`, `ngIf`, `ngSwitch`), and Ngrx state management to create a dynamic and interactive user experience.
Created reusable components to enhance code maintainability and enable efficient updates and future feature additions.
Built a clean, fully responsive UI/UX, ensuring smooth performance and a consistent experience across all devices.
Fetched product data dynamically from JSON to simulate API interactions, showcasing data handling in Angular.

name: Portfolio Website
description: Developed a dynamic shopping web app with core features like product categories, tab filters, search bar, and cart functionality.
Leveraged Angular components to improve code reusability and maintainability, streamlining future feature additions and reducing development time by 25%.
Implemented a fully responsive design, ensuring optimal performance and user experience across multiple devices and screensizes.
Integrated real-time updates for product listings and shopping cart, enhancing the overall user interaction flow.
